meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joel Richards Phyllis Massengale Bob McGoff Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1084.

td.p: Joel Richards, a carpenter from South Lake Tahoe, California
Phyllis Massengale, an accountant from San Antonio, Texas
Bob McGoff, a history teacher from Scranton, Pennsylvania (whose 2-day cash winnings total $26,201)

tr.td: WORLD GEOGRAPHY
POTENT POTABLES
TELEVISION HISTORY
POETS
GEOMETRY
MISSING LINKS
(Alex: We'll give you two-thirds of a trio; you have to supply the missing third.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Phyllis: What is a mountain?)

cape

PhyllisJoel
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The French word cap, as in Cap-Haitien, denotes this geographical feature')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The French word cap, as in Cap-Haitien, denotes this geographical feature

William Wordsworth

')

tequila

Phyllis
')
div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', 'Type of liquor that\'s the subject of the following 1983 hit by Shelly West:

"Jose Cuervo /
You are a friend of mine /
I like to drink you with..."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

Type of liquor that's the subject of the following 1983 hit by Shelly West:
"Jose Cuervo /
You are a friend of mine /
I like to drink you with..."

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'He married a woman with royal blood & then killed his own cousin to become king of Scotland')

tr.td: MONARCHS
He married a woman with royal blood & then killed his own cousin to become king of Scotland
Bob
Phyllis
Joel
3rd place: Colortyme TV + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
New champion: $5,900
2nd place: trip on Delta to Las Vegas & stay at Landmark Hotel & Casino + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
Bob
Phyllis
Joel

26 R
(including 3 DDs),
7 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
